What we are saying

Who is 1980 House Recordings.

1980 House Recordings is a French music label based in Vienna, Austria.


1980.

Imagine that you are listening the radio, late night and you are waiting that they are playing a track, that you don't know the name. And when it played, you must be very fast first to press the record button and then write what the speaker is saying. They are speaking very fast in general and chewing them words. No internet to check the tracklist. This is why 1980.


How artists can work with 1980 House Recordings.

It's not complicate at all but there is some steps to respect. Artists can get in touch with the label by all platforms but it's very important to send private soundcloud links. Write a small presentation, no need for a roman.


Why a private soundcloud link.

Because the music that the artists are sending should not have been listened by too many listeners Some artists are sending the music to all labels in one single mail. "Authenticity" is a major key on the music and on the attitude. With that track (or those) that will give goose bumps, then it'S important to create the same surprise effect and feeling to the listeners. It's all about "Love & Feelings".


"Underground", "More Music" and "Strictly House".

"Underground" is a really subjective word. A real underground music is completely out of any system. Here "Underground" means more "Not commercial" or "more deep", "more reflexise" it's very hard to define that sens and feeling. It's about being "humble" as well. There is a wish here to every single artists out there to get some kind of notoriety but artists who are just arrogant lazy and are looking like just for "fancyness", no way for them to work with 1980 House Rec. "More music" because maybe right now you are bored to read all of this. "Strictly House" is more about "No EDM" but the music can be at many borders. If the feeling is here, let's go for it, no questions. Believing in the music and what the artists are puting in, is essential.


What is the guarantee for the artists to work with 1980 House Recordings.

For sure love. The label is still very young. The best that can be make is always done, to put it more and more in front of the scene and at the same time, keeping the underground side. It's not easy but worth to try. Hopefuly soon it will be possible to do more for all of the artists past and future, because they all deserve.


What's next for the label.

Physical releases is a big dream of course. The website will be in permanent evolution. Some stuff connect with the "business" side of the Underground House Music world will be learn very soon. There is a wish to keep it underground but with a nice professional way. Believing in the dreams and trying to make them happen. Motivation and waking up early is apparently the key.


Last word. Massive thanks and respect for all artists, supporter and listeners.
